Class Ecosystem

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectfx.ecosystem.Ecosystem
public class Ecosystem extends Object
Represents an ecosystem composed of multiple environments and species. Provides methods to simulate and manage the interactions between species and environments.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ecosystem

      public Ecosystem()

  • Method Details

    • lancerSimulation

      public void lancerSimulation()
      Launches the ecosystem simulation. Applies environmental rules and updates the ecosystem cycle.

    • mettreAJourCycle

      public void mettreAJourCycle()
      Updates the ecosystem for each cycle, including species actions and environment updates. - Removes species with no energy left. - Allows species to move and reproduce. - Updates the season for each environment.

    • afficherEcosysteme

      public void afficherEcosysteme()
      Displays the current state of the ecosystem, including all environments and their species.

    • ajouterEnvironnement

      public void ajouterEnvironnement(Environment environment)
      Adds a new environment to the ecosystem.
      Parameters:
      environment - the Environment to be added.

    • ajouterEspece

      public void ajouterEspece(Species species)
      Adds a new species to the ecosystem and associates it with its environment.
      Parameters:
      species - the Species to be added.

    • removeEspece

      public void removeEspece(Species species)
      Removes a species from the ecosystem.
      Parameters:
      species - the Species to be removed.
